datamodel

类 RatingSystem2DBoolean

  • java.lang.Object
    • datamodel.RatingSystem2DBoolean
  • 直接已知子类:
    MF2DBoolean

    public class RatingSystem2DBoolean
extends java.lang.Object
    The basic data model. The data is organized in 2D of triples. Boolean means that a boolean matrix indicates the training set. The purpose is to enable incremental learning. Now only uncompressed data file is supported, that is, missing value is indicated by 99. In the near future, the data organized by triples should also be supported.
    Project: Three-way conversational recommendation.
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Fan Min
    www.fansmale.com, github.com/fansmale/TCR.
    Email: minfan@swpu.edu.cn, minfanphd@163.com.

      The popularity of items.

      Mean rating calculated from the training sets.

      Number of items.
      protected int numRatings
      Number of ratings.
      protected int numUsers
      Number of users.
      protected java.util.Random rand
      Used to generate random numbers.
      protected double ratingLowerBound
      The lower bound of the rating value.
      protected double ratingUpperBound
      The upper bound of the rating value.
      static java.lang.String SPLIT_SIGN
      A sign to help reading the data file.
      protected boolean[][] trainingIndicationMatrix
      Which elements belong to the training set.

      • RatingSystem2DBoolean

        public RatingSystem2DBoolean(java.lang.String paraFilename,
                             int paraNumUsers,
                             int paraNumItems,
                             int paraNumRatings,
                             double paraRatingLowerBound,
                             double paraRatingUpperBound)
        The first constructor.
        参数:
        paraFilename - The data filename.
        paraNumUsers - The number of users.
        paraNumItems - The number of items.
        paraNumRatings - The number of ratings.
        paraRatingLowerBound - The lower bound of ratings.
        paraRatingUpperBound - The upper bound of ratings.

    • 方法详细资料

      • readData

        public Triple[][] readData(java.lang.String paraFilename,
                           int paraNumUsers,
                           int paraNumItems,
                           int paraNumRatings)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Read the data from the file.
        参数:
        paraFilename - The given file.
        paraNumUsers - The number of users.
        paraNumItems - The number of items.
        paraNumRatings - The number of ratings.
        返回:
        The data in two-dimensional matrix of triples.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - In case the file cannot be read.

      • adjustUsingMeanRating

        public void adjustUsingMeanRating()
        Adjust the training data with the mean rating. The ratings are subtracted with the mean rating. So do the rating bounds.
